summary: This appears to be an email forwarding a draft FBI 302 report (interview summary) dated July 26, 2018, from an FBI agent in New York to another recipient. The subject line references 'PECKER 302', suggesting the report documents an interview with David Pecker, the former CEO of American Media Inc.

persons.name: David Pecker
persons.context: The subject line 'PECKER 302' indicates the attached FBI 302 report documents an interview with him, likely in his capacity as CEO of American Media Inc.

events.title: FBI Interview of David Pecker
events.description: An FBI 302 report was drafted summarizing an interview with David Pecker, likely conducted on or around this date.

events.title: Email Forwarding FBI 302
events.description: An email was sent forwarding the draft 'PECKER 302' report from an FBI agent in New York to another recipient.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain forwarding a draft FBI 302 report related to the Epstein investigation.
The 302 report is specifically labeled 'PECKER 302', confirming an FBI interview with David Pecker, the former head of American Media Inc.
The email was sent on August 10, 2018, forwarding a report drafted on July 26, 2018, indicating ongoing investigative activity at that time.
